schema.title: CementJob
schema.description: An actual single cement job post-job report/description/summary.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

WellboreID.title: Wellbore ID
WellboreID.description: Reference to the parent Wellbore. Cemented TubularAssembly would be installed to same Wellbore.

WellActivityID.title: Well Activity
WellActivityID.description: Identifier of the parent Well Activity in which the Cement Job was performed

VerticalMeasurement.title: Depth Reference Elevation
VerticalMeasurement.description: ID to the Zero Depth Point Vertical Measure elevation for depths contained in the Cement Job, Stages and Pumping Schedule, depth correction used to correlate MDs to original drilling rig MD. References an entry in the Vertical Measurement array for the Well parented by the wellbore via WellboreID.

WellboreTubularID.title: Cemented Tubular Assembly
WellboreTubularID.description: Installed Casing/Liner or other Tubular Assembly on which the Cement Job is performed. Not entered for Plug jobs in open hole.

HoleSectionID.title: Hole Section Identifier
HoleSectionID.description: Hole Section Assembly installed in and cement job performed in

WorkStringID.title: Work String ID
WorkStringID.description: Identifier of the TubularAssembly that describes the cement work string

OperatorRepresentativeRemarks.title: Operator Representative Remarks
OperatorRepresentativeRemarks.example: Performed 9 5/8” cement job as per Halliburton Procedure: Total Spacer: 60 bbls of 9.2 ppg tuned spacer lll. Cement recipe as follows; 177 sks at 1.59 cuft/sk for 281 cu/ft (50 bbls) of 15.6 ppg Class A cement. 0.07% EZ-FLO II, 2.3 lb/sk KCl, 0.12 gps Halad 344, 0.01 gps SA-640L, 0.14 gps HR-6L, 35% SS-200. Water requirement-6.42 gps, total mix fluid-6.69 gps. Total cement volume-50 bbls, 281 cu/ft. Shoe depth: 11,141’ MD, 10,219’ TVD. CML maintaining 9.2 ppg DHMW throughout cement job.

IsReturnsToSeabed.title: Is Returns To Seabed
IsReturnsToSeabed.description: Were fluid circulated/returned to seabed. Values are "true" (or "1") and "false" (or "0").

IsReciprocating.title: Is Reciprocating
IsReciprocating.description: Pipe being reciprocated.  Values are "true" (or "1") and "false" (or "0").

IsRotating.title: Is Rotating
IsRotating.description: Is pipe rotated during job.   Values are "true" (or "1") and "false" (or "0").

WaitOnCementDuration.title: Waiting On Cement time
WaitOnCementDuration.description:
Duration from cement placement and left
undisturbed until disturbed again.

HoleMeasuredDepth.title: Hole Measured Depth
HoleMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth at bottom of hole.

StringSetMeasuredDepth.title: String Set Measured Depth
StringSetMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth of cemented string casing/liner shoe.

StringSetTrueVerticalDepth.title: String Set True Vertical Depth
StringSetTrueVerticalDepth.description: True vertical depth of cement string shoe.

StageCollarMeasuredDepth.title: StageCollarMeasuredDepth
StageCollarMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth of the stage collar

LandingFloatCollarMeasuredDepth.title: LandingCollarMeasuredDepth
LandingFloatCollarMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth of the landing/float collar

RatholeLength.title: Rathole Length
RatholeLength.description: Distance from shoe to hole section bottom depth (Rathole)

PreviousShoeMeasuredDepth.title: Previous Shoe Measured Depth
PreviousShoeMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth of the previous casing/liner shoe.

PreviousShoeTrueVerticalDepth.title: Previous Shoe True Vertical Depth
PreviousShoeTrueVerticalDepth.description: Estimated True Vertical Depth of previous casing/liner shoe.

PlugTopMeasuredDepth.title: Plug Top Measured Depth
PlugTopMeasuredDepth.description: If Plug, measured depth of top of plug

PlugTopTrueVerticalDepth.title: Plug Top True Vertical Depth
PlugTopTrueVerticalDepth.description: If Plug, true vertical depth of top of plug. TVDs needed for  estimating hydrostatic pressure and temperature.

PlugBaseMeasuredDepth.title: Plug Base Measured Depth
PlugBaseMeasuredDepth.description: If Plug, measured depth of bottom of plug.

PlugBaseTrueVerticalDepth.title: Plug Base True Vertical Depth
PlugBaseTrueVerticalDepth.description: If Plug, true vertical depth of bottom of plug.

PlugInclinationAverage.title: Plug Inclination Average
PlugInclinationAverage.description: If Plug, average inclination of wellbore across plug depth calculated from directional survey

PlugInclinationMaximum.title: Plug Inclination Maximum
PlugInclinationMaximum.description: If Plug, maximum inclination of wellbore across plug depth calculated from directional survey

PlugDrillOutDate.title: Plug Drill Out Date
PlugDrillOutDate.description: Date when Cement Plug fully drilled out (not partial drill out).

SqueezeTopMeasuredDepth.title: Squeeze Top Measured Depth
SqueezeTopMeasuredDepth.description: Top Measured depth of squeeze e.g. long perforated interval. Single depth when specific point squeezed (top & base are same).

SqueezeWellboreOpeningID.title: Wellbore Opening
SqueezeWellboreOpeningID.description: ID of Wellbore Opening(s) through which Cement Squeezed

IsCoilTubing.title: Is Coil Tubing
IsCoilTubing.description: Coiled Tubing Used in the job (true=CTU used). Values are "true" (or "1") and "false" (or "0").

EstimatedCementTopMeasuredDepth.title: Estimated Cement Top Measured Depth
EstimatedCementTopMeasuredDepth.description: The estimated Measured depth of the Top of Cement (TOC) based on volume pumped.

CementToolTubularComponentID.title: Cement Tool Tubular Component ID
CementToolTubularComponentID.description: The identifier of the TubularComponent within the Cemented String TubularAssembly used for Cementing the wellbore

IsPipePulledWet.title: Pipe Pulled Wet
IsPipePulledWet.description: Is the pipe pulled wet (or dry) from cementing operation depth to surface for Plugs

PipePulledRateAvg.title: Pipe Pulled Rate
PipePulledRateAvg.description: Average rate pulled from cementing operation depth to surface

PipePulledRate.title: Pipe Pulled Rate
PipePulledRate.description: DEPRECATED: Use the new PipePulledRateAvg instead as this constant string property is malformed for the purpose.  Rate pulled from cementing operation depth to surface

PackerStingerMeasuredDepth.title: Packer Stinger Measured Depth
PackerStingerMeasuredDepth.description: DEPRECATED: Please use PackerStingerMeasureDepth instead as this string constant string property is malformed for the purpose. Packer or Stinger Measured Depth.

CementStages.title: Cement Stages
CementStages.description: Set of stages for the job (usually 1 or 2).

items.title: Cement Stage
items.description: A single cement stage performed within a Job.

IntervalTopMeasuredDepth.title: Interval Top Measured Depth
IntervalTopMeasuredDepth.description: Final placement measured depth at top of interval.

IntervalBaseMeasuredDepth.title: Interval Base Measured Depth
IntervalBaseMeasuredDepth.description: Final placement measured depth of base of interval.

IntervalTopTrueVerticalDepth.title: Interval Top True Vertical Depth
IntervalTopTrueVerticalDepth.description: Final placement True Vertical depth at top of interval.

IntervalBaseTrueVerticalDepth.title: Interval Base True Vertical Depth
IntervalBaseTrueVerticalDepth.description: Final placement True Vertical depth of base of interval.

StageIntervalLength.title: Stage Interval Length
StageIntervalLength.description: Measured depth interval for the cement stage (Base MD - Top MD).

MixStartDate.title: Mix Start Date/time
MixStartDate.description: Date/time when mixing of cement started.

DisplaceStartDate.title: Displacement Start Date/time
DisplaceStartDate.description: Date/time when displacing of cement started.

MudCirculationFlowRate.title: Mud Circulation Flowrate
MudCirculationFlowRate.description: Mud Circulation Flowrate during the job

CementingFluid.title: Cementing Fluid
CementingFluid.description: Array of fluids worked in the stage - displaced mud, washers and spacers, cement (lead & tail)

items.title: Cementing Fluid
items.description: Original mud, washes, spacers, cement and displacement fluid properties.

FluidIndex.title: Fluid Index
FluidIndex.description:
Cement pumping schedule index or sequence number. Fluid Index: 1: first fluid pumped (=original mud)
					(last-1)=Tail cement, last= displacement mud

FluidName.title: Name of Fluid
FluidName.description: Name of Fluid e.g. Lead or Tail Slurry

FluidCommercialNameID.title: Commercial name of Fluid
FluidCommercialNameID.description: Commercial product or trade name of fluid

TopMeasuredDepth.title: Fluid Top Measured Depth
TopMeasuredDepth.description: Estimated Measured depth at top of fluid placement at end of Stage.

BaseMeasuredDepth.title: Fluid Base Measured Depth
BaseMeasuredDepth.description: Estimate Measured depth at bottom of fluid placement at end of Stage

SlurryHeight.title: SlurryHeight
SlurryHeight.description: Measured depth interval between the top and base of the slurry placement.

OpenHoleExcessPercent.title: Open Hole Excess Percent
OpenHoleExcessPercent.description: Open Hole Excess Slurry Volume Percent

CasedHoleExcessPercent.title: Cased Hole Excess Percent
CasedHoleExcessPercent.description: Cased Hole Excess Slurry Volume Percent

TotalFluidVolume.title: Total Fluid Volume
TotalFluidVolume.description: Total Fluid/Slurry Volume. If CementingFluid is NOT a cement slurry, then report the total fluid volume created of the fluid in question.

GaugeHoleSize.title: Gauge Hole Size
GaugeHoleSize.description: Gauge Hole Size for estimating annular volume

FluidRheologicalModelID.title: Fluid Rheological Model ID
FluidRheologicalModelID.description: Fluid Rheological Model - Newtonian/Bingham/Power Law/Herschel Bulkley.

ViscometerIndex.title: Viscometer Index
ViscometerIndex.description: Viscometer index or sequence number. Used to retain order.

Viscosity.title: Viscosity
Viscosity.description: Viscosity (Newtonian) or Plastic Viscosity if Bingham. Not relevant for other rheological models.

YieldPoint.title: Yield Point
YieldPoint.description: Yield point (Bingham and Herschel Bulkley models).

N.title: N
N.description: Power Law index (Power Law and Herschel-Bulkley).

DryBlendMass.title: Dry Blend Mass
DryBlendMass.description: Total mass of dry blend including additives: the volume is not constant.

DryBlendMassPerUnit.title: Dry Blend Mass per Unit
DryBlendMassPerUnit.description: Weight of a sack of dry blend aka Sack Size or Tonnes

CementMassUnitTypeID.title: Cement Mass Unit Type
CementMassUnitTypeID.description: Cement Mass Unit Type (Sacks or Tonnes)

YieldVolume.title: Slurry Yield Volume
YieldVolume.description: Cement Slurry Yield Volume. Calculated - Sacks Used * CementYield

GasFoamTypeID.title: Gas Foam Type
GasFoamTypeID.description: Gas type used for foam job.

GasFoamVolume.title: GasFoam Volume
GasFoamVolume.description: Volume of gas used for foam job

DensityConstantGasMethodID.title: Density Constant Gas Ratio Method
DensityConstantGasMethodID.description: Constant gas ratio method for measuring average density.

GasMethodStartRatio.title: Gas Method Start Ratio
GasMethodStartRatio.description: Gas foam method: initial method ratio

GasMethodEndRatio.title: Gas Method End Ratio
GasMethodEndRatio.description: Gas foam method: final method ratio

CompressiveStrengthTestPressure.title: Compressive Strength Test Pressure
CompressiveStrengthTestPressure.description: Pressure held during Compressive Strength test

CompressiveStrengthTransitTime.title: Compressive Strength Transit Time
CompressiveStrengthTransitTime.description: Transit Time measured over a set length (microseconds)

ThickeningTimeTest.title: Thickening Test
ThickeningTimeTest.description: Thickening Test - Pressure, Temperature, Consistency (Bc) v Elapsed Time

ThickeningTestConsistency.title: Thickening Test Consistency
ThickeningTestConsistency.description: Thickening text consistency/slurry viscosity: Bearden Consistency (Bc) 0 to 100.

ZeroGelElapsedTime.title: Zero Gel Elapsed Time
ZeroGelElapsedTime.description: The elapsed time from initiation of the static portion of the test until the slurry attains a gel strength of 100lbf/100sq ft.

TransitionElapsedTime.title: Transition Elapsed Time
TransitionElapsedTime.description: The elapsed time between the development of 100lbf/100sq ft gel strength and 500lbf/100 sq ft gel strength.

FreeFluidTestAngle.title: Free Fluid Test Angle
FreeFluidTestAngle.description: Free Fluid Test Angle e.g. 0  or 45 degrees

FluidLossElapsedTime.title: Fluid Loss Elapsed Time
FluidLossElapsedTime.description: Fluid loss dehydrating test period, used to compute the API fluid loss.

CementAdditives.title: Cement Additives
CementAdditives.description: Cement Additives list. Additives can be added in slurry but also in spacers, washes, mud.

items.title: Cement Additive
items.description: Additives/chemicals added to a Fluid during a cement job

AdditiveIndex.title: Additive Index
AdditiveIndex.description: Additive index or sequence number. Used to retain order.

AdditiveNameID.title: Additive Name ID
AdditiveNameID.description: Relationship to a FluidAdditiveName reference-data record.

AdditiveTypeID.title: Additive Type ID
AdditiveTypeID.description: The liquid, solid or gaseous substance used to manipulate the function or properties of a fluid.

AdditiveRoleID.title: Additive Role ID
AdditiveRoleID.description: The chief purpose or reason for adding a substance to a fluid used in a downhole operation.

AdditiveTypeConcentrationID.title: Type Conc
AdditiveTypeConcentrationID.description: ConcentrationType: %BWOC (%By weight of Cement), %BWOB (%By weight of blend), %BWOW (%By weight of water), %BWOBF (%By weight of base fluid)

AdditiveConcentrationAmount.title: Concentration Amount
AdditiveConcentrationAmount.description: Concentration Amount: unit type depends on typeConc.

AdditiveConcentrationUnitOfMeasureID.title: Additive Concentration Unit Of Measure ID

AdditiveMSDSID.title: Additive MSDS ID
AdditiveMSDSID.description: ID of or URL to Material Safety Data Sheet

AdditiveRemark.title: Remark
AdditiveRemark.example: Mix Water was batch mixed, extra chemicals to account for dead volume in the batch mixer

StartDatetime.title: Start Date/Time
StartDatetime.description: Date/time when the pump schedule interval started.

EndDatetime.title: End Date/Time
EndDatetime.description: Date/time when the pump schedule interval ended.

ElapsedTime.title: Elapsed Time
ElapsedTime.description: Duration of the pumping schedule interval

PumpRateMin.title: Pump Rate Minimum
PumpRateMin.description: Minimum Rate fluid is pumped. 0 means it is a pause.

PumpRateMax.title: Pump Rate Maximum
PumpRateMax.description: Maximum Rate fluid is pumped. 0 means it is a pause.

PumpRateAvg.title: Pump Rate Average
PumpRateAvg.description: Average Rate fluid is pumped. 0 means it is a pause.

PumpStrokesEstimated.title: Pump Strokes Estimated
PumpStrokesEstimated.description: Number of Pump strokes estimated for the fluid to be pumped (assumed pump output known)

PumpStrokesActual.title: Pump Strokes Actual
PumpStrokesActual.description: Number of actual Pump strokes for the fluid to be pumped (assumed pump output known)

BackPressure.title: Back Pressure
BackPressure.description: Back pressure applied during pumping stage.

ExcessFluidRatio.title: Excess Fluid Ratio
ExcessFluidRatio.description: The ratio of excess fluid to total fluid pumped during the step

FluidTopTrueVerticalDepth.title: Fluid Top True Vertical Depth
FluidTopTrueVerticalDepth.description: True Vertical Depth at top of fluid placement at the end of Stage.

FluidBaseTrueVerticalDepth.title: Fluid BaseTrue Vertical Depth
FluidBaseTrueVerticalDepth.description: True Vertical Depth at bottom of fluid placement at the end of Stage.

AnnularFluidVolume.title: Annular Fluid Volume
AnnularFluidVolume.description: Volume of given fluid that resides in the annulus.

StringMeasuredDepth.title: String Measured Depth
StringMeasuredDepth.description: Bottom measured depth in primary cement job (multi-stage cement job).

StageToolMeasuredDepth.title: Stage Tool Measured Depth
StageToolMeasuredDepth.description: Mid measured depth of stage tool (multi-stage cement job) e.g. circulation port.

StageToolTrueVerticalDepth.title: Stage Tool True Vertical Depth
StageToolTrueVerticalDepth.description: Mid true vertical depth of stage tool (multi-stage cement job) e.g. circulation port.

CoilTubingMeasuredDepth.title: Coil Tubing Measured Depth
CoilTubingMeasuredDepth.description: Bottom Measured depth of Coiled Tubing

OutsideCasingVolume.title: Outside Casing Volume
OutsideCasingVolume.description: Estimated volume outside casing for this stage placement

PriorCirculatingVolume.title: Prior Circulating Volume
PriorCirculatingVolume.description: Volume of mud circulated prior to cement job

MudFunnelViscosity.title: Mud Funnel Viscosity
MudFunnelViscosity.description: Marsh funnel viscosity measured in a conical-shaped funnel

MudPlasticViscosity.title: Mud Plastic Viscosity
MudPlasticViscosity.description: Plastic viscosity (in hole at start of job).

MudYieldPoint.title: Mud Yield Point
MudYieldPoint.description: Yield point (in hole at start of job).

MudGel10Sec.title: Mud Gel10 Sec
MudGel10Sec.description: Gels-10Sec (in hole at start of job).

MudGel10Min.title: Mud Gel10 Min
MudGel10Min.description: Gels-10Min (in hole at start of job).

IsAnnularFlowAfter.title: Annular Flow After
IsAnnularFlowAfter.description: Annular flow (back flow) present after the stage was completed?

BottomDartLandVolume.title: Bottom Dart Landed Volume
BottomDartLandVolume.description: Volume pumped to landing Bottom Dart

TopDartLandVolume.title: Top Dart Landed Volume
TopDartLandVolume.description: Volume pumped to landing Top Dart

BackPressure.title: Surface Back Pressure
BackPressure.description: Constant back pressure applied at surface while pumping the job (can be superseded by a back pressure per pumping stage).

PressureHeldTime.title: Pressure Held Time
PressureHeldTime.description: Pressure Held time at end of stage

CirculateOutMeasuredDepth.title: Circulate Out Measured Depth.
CirculateOutMeasuredDepth.description: Circulate out measured depth from top of cement plug

IsTailPipeUsed.title: Is Tail Pipe Used
IsTailPipeUsed.description: Tail pipe/stinger used for setting a plug?

WorkstringMeasuredDepth.title: Workstring Measured Depth
WorkstringMeasuredDepth.description: Workstring Bottom Measured Depth during displacement for Plugs & Squeezes

WorkstringTrueVerticalDepth.title: Workstring True Vertical Depth
WorkstringTrueVerticalDepth.description: Workstring Bottom True Vertical Depth during displacement for Plugs & Squeezes

SqueezeToolMeasuredDepth.title: Squeeze Tool Measured Depth
SqueezeToolMeasuredDepth.description: Squeeze Tool Measured Depth e.g. Packer or Retainer

SqueezeToolTrueVerticalDepth.title: Squeeze Tool True Vertical Depth
SqueezeToolTrueVerticalDepth.description: Squeeze Tool True Vertical Depth e.g. Packer or Retainer

SqueezeInCasingVolume.title: Squeeze In Casing Volume
SqueezeInCasingVolume.description: Squeezed cement volume left inside casing

SqueezeReverseVolume.title: Squeeze Reverse Volume
SqueezeReverseVolume.description: Volume of cement that was returned to surface during squeeze operation

SqueezeHeldPressure.title: Squeeze Held Pressure
SqueezeHeldPressure.description: Squeeze pressure left (held) on pipe while waiting on cement.

TotalOperatingTime.title: Total Operating Time
TotalOperatingTime.description: Total operating hours from at depth ready for cement job. Included but not limited to: Pre-circulation, NPT, rig up/down, line-up and pumping operations.

TotalPumpingTime.title: Total Pumping Time
TotalPumpingTime.description: Total pumping hours from at depth ready for cement job. Included but not limited to: Pre-circulation, washing, spacer, cement and displacement.

MaxStaticTimeSurface.title: Max Static Time Surface
MaxStaticTimeSurface.description: Max Static Time Surface - cement unit and surface lines

StageRemarks.title: Stage Remarks
StageRemarks.example:
Circulating rates were established prior to the start of the cement job. Controlled Mud Level was 
maintained at a Downhole Mud Weight of 9.2 ppg for the entire circulation and cement job.

CasingTestElapsedTime.title: Casing Test Elapsed Time
CasingTestElapsedTime.description: Casing Test Elapsed Time following end of cement job

MaintainPressurePercent.title: Maintained Pressure Percent
MaintainPressurePercent.description: Maintained Pressure % of Initial Test Pressure

PressureChangePerTime.title: Pressure Change/Time
PressureChangePerTime.description: Incremental Pressure Over Defined Time Interval

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.example: Set the seal assembly as per FMC direction. Closed the MPR and apply 9,000 psi to set seal assembly. Held for 5 minutes to verify the seal integrity. Bled pressure off and open the MPR. tank.

BeforeLogElapsedTime.title: Elapsed Time Before Log
BeforeLogElapsedTime.description: Elapsed Time Before Log from end of Cement Job

IsCementFoundOnTool.title: Cement Found On Tool
IsCementFoundOnTool.description: Cement Found On Tool during Evaluation Log run

IsCementFoundBetweenShoeCollar.title: Cement Found Between Shoe Collar
IsCementFoundBetweenShoeCollar.description: Cement Found Between Shoe Collar during Evaluation Log run

ShoeTestElapsedTime.title: Elapsed Time Before Shoe Test
ShoeTestElapsedTime.description: Elapsed Time Before Shoe Test following end of cement job

ShoeTestComments.title: Shoe Test Remarks
ShoeTestComments.example: Perform FIT on 9 5/8” casing shoe. Shoe depth, 11,141’ MD/ 10,219’ TVD. XACT downhole static MW was 9.39 ppg. Cement unit began pumping at .5 bbl/min and pumped a total of .9 bbls. Wellhead pressure increased from 390 psi to 490 psi (100 psi Increase) and pump was stopped. Xact ECD recorded a maximum of 9.58 EMW (45 second delay). Pressure was bled off .9 bbls back.  FIT result = 9.39 ppg 100 psi applied at 10,219’ TVD. PWD pumped up 9.62 EMW.

PlannedTopMeasuredDepth.title: Planned Top of Cement Measured Depth
PlannedTopMeasuredDepth.description: Planned Top of Cement (TOC) Measured Depth

TopOfCementTrueVerticalDepth.title: Top of Cement True Vertical Depth
TopOfCementTrueVerticalDepth.description: Top of Cement (TOC) True Vertical Depth

InterpretationRemarks.title: Remarks
InterpretationRemarks.description: Comments or Remarks of the TOC Interpretation

LinerTopTestElapsedTime.title: Elapsed Time Before Test
LinerTopTestElapsedTime.description: Elapsed Time Before Test following end of cement job

NegativeTestEquivalentMudWeight.title: Liner Negative Test Equivalent Mud Weight
NegativeTestEquivalentMudWeight.description: Liner Negative Test Equivalent Mud Weight

PositiveTestEquivalentMudWeight.title: Liner Positive Test Equivalent Mud Weight
PositiveTestEquivalentMudWeight.description: Liner Positive Test Equivalent Mud Weight

ShoetrackCementTestRemarks.title: Shoetrack Cement Test Remarks
ShoetrackCementTestRemarks.example: Drill cement and shoe track F/ 11,121’ T/ 11,141’. Circulated 9.2ppg SMW DIF at 500gpm, 1,200psi. Rotated 50rpm, 9-11k torque. 15-20k WOB. P/U-515k S/O-470k. Boosted riser with 400gpm, 250psi. Top Fill pump at 160gpm.

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.example: Halliburton displaced cement with 364 bbls of 9.2 ppg SBM SMW followed by 50 bbls of 6.8 ppg base oil at 4 bpm, 130-240 psi. Full returns observed during job. CML maintaining 9.2 ppg DHMW throughout cement job. Cement in place at 0115 hours, bled back 5 bbls, Floats holding.
